text: @SenateGOP @realDonaldTrump We the people are not fooled on who has blood on their hands! Donald J Trump! Called COVID19  a HOAX when the W.H.O. warned the White House this was serious! Trump wasted time instead of Leadership! Shameful finger pointing!
